meanings.definition: Gravitinos: hypothetical elementary particles that are predicted by some theories of particle physics to mediate the force of gravity
meanings.sent1: Scientists study gravitinos to understand how gravity works at a tiny level.
meanings.sent2: The existence of gravitinos could revolutionize our understanding of the universe.
meanings.sent3: When the gravitinos started dancing, the laws of physics got confused!
meanings.sent4: The gravitinos pulled everything together like a cosmic magnet.
meanings.sent5: In the world of particles, gravitinos are the silent architects of the universe.

meanings.definition: Gravitinos: a type of particle that may be a candidate for dark matter in the universe
meanings.sent1: Dark matter mysteries might be unraveled by the elusive gravitinos.
meanings.sent2: The search for gravitinos could unlock the secrets of the cosmos.
meanings.sent3: The gravitinos played hide and seek with the astronomers, blending into the darkness.
meanings.sent4: In the vast expanse of space, gravitinos are the enigmatic shadows.
meanings.sent5: The universe whispered its secrets to those who understood the language of gravitinos.
